    • Book Now Sign Waivers Memberships Eat. Sleep. Ride. Repeat. For all of our die-hard wakeboarders, we now offer a variety of membership options to fit any budget and need. All memberships provide unlimited access to both the advanced and beginner cables during operating hours. For more information call (561) 323-3937 or email info561@sharkwakepark.com . Book Now Annual Pass $1,600 $1,600 before tax, must be paid in full Valid for 365 days from purchase date Unlimited Cable Park, daily 30% OFF Shark Shack & Shark Merchandise Referral Program: Earn $100 when you refer an individual to enroll in an Annual Membership 1x time Pass Freeze for up to 6 months for injury or extenuating circumstances Annual – Monthly Payment Plan $400 Enrollment Fee + $120/each month (prices before tax) Automatic billing/reoccurring payments (same date each month) Unlimited Cable Park, daily 30% OFF Shark Shack & Shark Merchandise Referral Program: Earn $100 when you refer someone to enroll in an Annual Membership Restrictions To become a Member, individuals must be at least 10 years old and able to swim. Participants under 10 years old must complete the mandatory Cable Safety Lesson before enrolling in a Membership option. For more information on our mandatory Cable Safety lesson, check out our Lessons Page .     • Book Now Sign Waivers Cable Park The First Time is Never the Last. Your next adventure is calling. Answer it at Shark Wake Park. Enjoy wake boarding, knee boarding, water skiing, wake skating and foil boarding - our state-of-the-art wake park is perfect for riders of all skill levels. Book Now General Info Please arrive at least 15 minutes prior to your session. Please complete SWP activity waiver(s) before arrival. Restrictions For Cable Park & Combo Ticket Options, participants must be 10 years or older, and able to swim. *Cable Safety Lesson is mandatory if you are under 10 years old and it’s your first visit to Shark Wake Park. See Lessons Page for more info.     • Book Now Sign Waivers Group Events We ❤️ Groups Shark Wake Park is the perfect all-in-one outdoor entertainment destination for private parties, groups, schools, gyms, churches, team building events and everything in between. Book the Obstacle Island, Cable Park, Shark Shack or a combination of all three. We offer private and semi-private group bookings for the young and the young at heart and can customize any activity for groups of at least 10 people or more. Catering options, music, food trucks and alcoholic beverages available as add-ons. Group Events Video Group Options Group options are available during standard operating hours. Participants must arrive 30 minutes before activity start time. Obstacle Island Group Options Maximum Participants: 125 10+ Participants 15% Off (1) Session: $30.00 (2) Sessions: $38.00 25+ Participants 20% Off (1) Session: $28.00 (2) Sessions: $36.00 50+ Participants 30% Off (1) Session: $25.00 (2) Sessions: $32.00 Each session is (50) minutes long with a (10) minute break between sessions. Sessions begin on the hour, every hour. Restrictions: Ages 6+, 45" tall and able to swim All Access Group Options 10+ Participants 15% Off $58.50pp 25+ Participants 20% Off $52.00pp Includes (2) Obstacle Island sessions, followed by (2) hours of cable park. Ages 10+ Group FAQs For frequently asked questions regarding groups, please click below. Group FAQ s Interested in scheduling your group event? Click the Book Now button below. One of our staff members would be happy to assist. Book Now 10-25 Participants Book Now 25+ Participants Private Rental Options Private rentals are available daily, please inquire for availability, pricing and options. Activity Options Obstacle Island Cable Park All Access Rental Areas Shark Shack Outdoors Hammerhead Room Indoors Great White Room Indoors Additional Options Food & Drink Options Live Music Custom Requests & More Interested in hosting your event with Shark Wake Park? Fill out the form below. One of our staff members would be happy to assist.     • Book Now Sign Waivers About Shark Park 561 At Shark Wake Park, we know life’s just more fun on the water. That’s why we’re committed to building and operating some of the best family-friendly outdoor entertainment centers in the world. Location Shark Wake Park 561 is located at Okeeheelee Park in West Palm Beach, Florida. FAQ s Answers to your frequently asked questions about wakeboarding and our park. Videos Check out our library of videos for a guided tour of all Shark Wake Park has to offer. Park Calendar Our calendar of events including extended hour holidays, camp schedule and park specials. Who We Are Since opening the first location in 2016, our founder Greg Norman Jr. has continued to expand his vision. Photo Gallery View photos from Shark Wake Park 561, located in West Palm Beach, Florida. Careers Current job openings are listed here. You can also submit your resume at any time. Contact Us Please take a moment to send us your questions or comments.     • Book Now Sign Waivers Group Event FAQ s Group Event FAQ s What are group rates? Group rates are discounted from standard pricing for groups with 10+ participants. How much are group rates and what’s included? Obstacle Island (1) Session: Starting at $255 Includes one (1) 50-minute Obstacle Island Session 10+ Participants: 15% OFF - $25.50pp 25+ Participants: 20% OFF - $24.00pp 50+ Participants: 30% OFF – $21.00pp Obstacle Island (2) Session: Starting at $340 Includes two (2) consecutive 50-min Obstacle Island Sessions 10+ Participants: 15% OFF - $34.00pp 25+ Participants: 20% OFF - $32.00pp 50+ Participants: 30% OFF – $28.00pp All Access (3) Sessions: Starting at $550 Includes two (2) consecutive 50-minute Obstacle Island Sessions, followed by (1) hour of Cable Park. Rental gear is included. 10+ Participants: 15% OFF - $55.00pp 25+ Participants: 20% OFF - $52.00pp *Obstacle Island activity is first* Is there a cost for spectators? There is no cost or fee for spectators. Participants refer to individuals who will participate in the water activities. Do participants need to complete a waiver? Yes, all participants must complete our waiver. We recommend completing the waiver BEFORE arrival to assist with a timely check in. Once your event is scheduled, our staff will email you with a unique waiver link which attaches your party guest waiver directly to your booking. Please note, this link will be sent separately from your booking confirmation email . Utilizing the unique waiver link will assist with a timely check-in on the day of your event. Are food and drinks included with group bookings? No, group bookings do not include food, but options are available. Whole Pizzas, (2) Liter Sodas Additional options may be available. Please inquire for more information When can I schedule a group event? Group rates are available during standard operating hours. We are a seasonal business, and our hours vary throughout the year. Please reference our website park calendar for our daily schedule. If you would like to host an event outside of standard operating hours, please inquire about a private event. How can I schedule a group event? Online booking is available for groups of 10-24 participants. For groups with 25+ participants, please complete the group event inquiry form located on our website and one of our staff members will be happy to assist you. How far in advance should I schedule a group event? We require at least (1) week’s advanced scheduling. We have a limited capacity facility and operate on a first come first served basis. We recommend scheduling your group event at your earliest convenience to ensure availability for your preferred date and time. Can I schedule if I am unsure of my participant count? Yes, you can schedule even if you aren’t certain of your final participant count. For groups of 10-24 participants The base package is required to schedule, which includes (10) participants. For groups of 25+ participants We require a $250 deposit to schedule. You can adjust your participant count up to (1) week before your event, without penalty. Please note, final payment will reflect the applicable per person rate. Do group bookings require payment in full at the time of scheduling? For groups of 10-24 participants The base package is required to schedule, which includes (10) participants. You have up until (1) week before your event to add additional participants, based on availability. For groups of 25+ participants A $250 deposit is required. After scheduling, you have up until (1) week before your event to finalize participant count and final payment. To ensure adequate spaces are reserved for your group, we recommend scheduling for the maximum number of participants that may attend. You are not penalized for changes made to participant count before the finalization deadline. What happens if my participant count changes after finalization? If your participant count increases after finalization, you can request to add participants up to (2) days before your event. This option is not guaranteed and is contingent upon available capacity. We have a limited capacity facility, and we operate on a first come, first serve basis. We do not offer refunds within (1) week of a scheduled event. What happens if participants don’t show up? Due to limited capacity, we do not offer refunds or credits for no show participants. How are group events structured? Groups must arrive (30) minutes before the activity start time. Activity start times begin on the hour, every hour Activity times are strictly structured. Due to limited capacity, we do not provide time extensions, refunds, or credits for late arrivals. Are deposits refundable? Deposits are refundable up to (1) week before a scheduled event. Within (1) week of a scheduled event we do not offer refunds Deposit refund requests must be submitted via email, more than (1) week before your scheduled event. What happens if I don’t show up? Do I get a refund? We do not provide refunds within (1) week of a scheduled event. We do not provide refunds or credits for no show participants. What happens if I am late? Do I get extra time or a refund? Activity times are strictly structured due to limited capacity. We do not offer time extensions, refunds, or credits for late arrivals. Can I reschedule my event if needed? We accept reschedule requests up to (2) days before a scheduled event, which is subject to availability. Reschedule requests must be submitted via email. What happens if there are weather disruptions? Do I get a refund? We do not close for weather forecasts or rain alone. If there is lightning within a (8) mile radius, all activities must stop until we are lightning free for 20 consecutive minutes. Depending on closure duration and available capacity, activity time extensions may be available, but are not guaranteed. For extended weather disruptions, rain check credits will be provided to the group organizer, based on the disruption duration. Rain checks are valid for (60) days. Groups may opt to reschedule up to (2) days before a scheduled event if weather forecasts are unfavorable, but we do not offer refunds. In extreme circumstances, in which weather imposes safety concerns, management retains the right to enforce unexpected closures. These instances will be handled on a case-by-case basis.
